# [Interview #849: Memories of Light, Entry #18](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=849#18)

#### Day 18

Fortuona ignored her, standing. "This woman is my new
*Soe'feia*
. Holy woman, she who may not be touched. We have been blessed. Let it be known." (p. 494)
